title: Train Your Own Neural Network
description: This video covers how to train a neural network machine learning model with real-time interactive data in ml5.js. The example demonstrated uses the mouse as input and performs classification (the assigned label is a musical note).

codeExamples.title: Train you own neural network
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to train your own neural network.

links.title: Wekinator
links.description: The wekinator allows anyone to use machine learning to build new musical instruments, gestural game controllers, computer vision or computer listening systems, and more.

links.title: Eyeo 2018 - Rebecca Fiebrink
links.description: In this talk, Rebecca Fiebrink questions how we can use machine learning to better support fundamentally human creative activities.

links.title: This is not a theremin
links.description: This is not a theremin--this is just an AR and interactive representation of a theremin.
